name: Exotic Kosmos
description:
In Exotic Kosmos, the player takes on the role of an inhabitant of a virtual cosmos, who fights in real time against all kinds of adversity. Challenge your friends to PvP combats with up to four simultaneous players and also enjoy the adventure mode, where our hero, alongside his companion Pet, has in his favor fists that can perform powerful punches, in addition to using special spells and also evolving his attributes through cards collected during his space journey.

MAIN FEATURES:

  • Physical combat in real time.
  • Simple and organic mechanics, inspired by Arcade Games.
  • PvP with up to 4 simultaneous players.
  • 3 character classes that can be evolved.
  • Explore the maps of the worlds.
  • Immersive soundtrack.
  • Card craft, perform fusions to compose increasingly powerful cards.
  • Procedurally generated spatial environments.
